W00800 FL220/320 MOV NNW 20KT NC==

WSUS32 KKCI 202155 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 33C 
VALID UNTIL 2355Z 
WI MN 
FROM 30NNE EAU-30SE MSP-50WNW MSP 
LINE TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 30035KT. TOPS TO FL230. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 202355-210355 
FROM 40SSE BDF-40W TTH-DYR-40NNE ADM-40NNE TCC-60SSE LAA-30N 
TUL-40NNE STL-40SSE BDF 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
